page.title: 15RECREATION IN GREAT WAKERING
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR SPORT IS SWIMMING ALTHOUGH THERE IS NOT A PUBLIC SWIMMING POOL IN OUR AREA.THE NEXT MOST POPULAR IS BADMINTON AND THEN COMES FOOTBALL. SWIMMING IS MORE POPULAR WITH MEN AND YOUNG GIRLS AND WOMEN SEEM TO PREFER BADMINTON. BOYS ARE STILL VERY FOND OF FOOTBALL AND IT IS THE MOST POPULAR SPORT AMONG BOYS. THERE ARE MANY OTHER SPORTS AND PASTTIMES WHICH PEOPLE ENJOY AND SOME OF THEM ARE SQUASH, FISHING, CRICKET, BOWLS AND ROLLER SKATING. MANY PEOPLE HAVE HOBBIES WHICH THEY DO AT HOME, SUCH AS GARDENING, MODEL MAKING AND KNITTING. THE MOST POPULAR PASTIME IS JUST WATCHING THE TELEVISION AND MOST PEOPLE SPEND THE GREATER PART OF THEIR LEISURE TIME DOING THIS. FAMILIES GO OUT FOR OUTINGS TOGETHER MORE IN THE SUMMER THAN IN THE WINTER BUT MOST GO OUT TOGETHER AT LEAST ONCE A WEEK.
